text: Escitalopram is an antidepressant medication. It is used as a drug to help treat depression, obsessive-compulsive disorder, social anxiety disorder and other mental illnesses. It is commonly known and sold as Lexapro or Cipralex.Lexapro article == Side Effects == Escitalopram can cause sleeping problems, dry mouth and diarrhea. It can also cause sexual problems.Lexapro prescribing information These sexual problems usually disappear after a person stops using the drug. However, in some cases these problems can last for months or years. ==Related pages== * Fluoxetine == References == Category:Drugs used in psychiatry Category:Organonitrogen compounds Category:Organofluorides
title: Escitalopram
